alert.note: Alert for Harvey; Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 29 at 2:53AM CDT until April 29 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Sedgwick County in south central Kansas... Harvey County in south central Kansas... * Until 400 AM CDT. * At 253 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Andale, or near Colwich, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Newton, Park City, Valley Center, Maize, Halstead, Sedgwick, Colwich, Burrton, Mount Hope, Andale and Bentley. This includes Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 16 and 31. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
